parameters.content:
## ğŸ¯ JOB HUNTER AGENT

**What it does:**
1. Scrapes jobs from LinkedIn (Apify), Dice, Google
2. Filters last 24 hours only
3. Deduplicates against seen jobs
4. AI matches jobs to your resume
5. Outputs clean sheet with fit scores

**Run:** Daily at 8 AM IST
**Manual:** Click 'Test Workflow' anytime

assignments.name: job_titles
assignments.value: AI Project Manager,AI Consultant,Gen AI Engineer,Data Engineer,ML Engineer

parameters.content:
## âš™ï¸ CONFIGURATION

**FILL THESE VALUES:**

1. `resume_file_id` - Your Google Drive resume file ID
2. `output_sheet_id` - New Google Sheet for results
3. `seen_jobs_sheet_id` - Sheet to track seen jobs
4. `apify_api_key` - From apify.com Settings

**Job titles & locations** can be edited anytime

## ğŸ”— LINKEDIN SCRAPER

**Uses:** Apify LinkedIn Jobs Scraper
**Cost:** ~$0.50 per 100 jobs

**Note:** This starts an async run.
Next node waits for completion.

## ğŸ² DICE SCRAPER

**Method:** Direct HTTP + HTML parse
**Filter:** Posted in last 24h
**Cost:** Free!

**Note:** Dice is scrape-friendly.
No account needed.

## ğŸ” GOOGLE JOBS

**Uses:** SerpAPI (or alternative)
**Cost:** ~$50/mo for 5000 searches

**Alternative:** Can use Apify's
Google Jobs scraper instead

**TODO:** Add your SerpAPI key
or switch to Apify Google Jobs

## ğŸš« DEDUPLICATION

**How it works:**
1. Read all job IDs from 'Seen Jobs' sheet
2. Filter out any job we've seen before
3. Only new jobs go to AI matching

**Sheet columns:**
- job_id (unique identifier)
- title
- company
- date_seen

## ğŸ¤– AI MATCHING

**What AI does:**
1. Read job description
2. Compare to your resume
3. Score fit (1-10)
4. Suggest resume tweaks
5. Extract recruiter email if found

**Model:** Uses your default AI
(Claude/GPT in n8n)

## âœ… OUTPUT

**Output Sheet columns:**
- title, company, location
- description (truncated)
- apply_link
- recruiter_email
- fit_score (1-10)
- matching_skills
- gaps
- resume_suggestions
- source, scraped_at

**Sorted:** Highest fit score first!

## ğŸš€ HOW TO USE

**First time setup:**
1. Fill in Configuration node values
2. Create 2 Google Sheets:
   - Output sheet (results)
   - Seen Jobs sheet (dedup)
3. Get your Apify API key
4. Connect Google credentials

**Test:** Click 'â–¶ï¸ Manual Test'
**Production:** Runs daily 8 AM

3. Deduplicates against seen jobs
4. AI matches jobs to your resume
